name: Line-3
description:
Line-3 is a futuristic take on Picaria, a traditional board game of Native American cultures. The goal is to get three in a row, as in Tic-Tac-Toe, but Picaria offers more variety and tactical depth. The rules are simple:

1. Drop Phase: Tap to place your 3 stones on any of the highlighted pins
2. Move Phase: Slide your stones to a free pin to form a line of three

Line-3 packs Picaria's mechanics into an exciting high-score based game with varying AI difficulty over 15 rounds, and a stunning visual presentation.


Features:

● Easy to learn and play, yet challenging to master, with quick and casual game rounds
● Adaptive AI with three difficulty levels, indicated by varying color themes
● Beautiful soft illumination from randomly generated lighting setups
● Realtime ray tracing, thoroughly optimized for the latest generation of iOS devices
● Premium app, free of any ads and in-app purchases

Line-3 is the first mobile game to take full advantage of ray tracing, a demanding illumination technique that is often employed in major film productions.
